10:01 <tmortagne> AndreasJonsson: Hi  
10:01 <tmortagne> starting to play with AuthorizationManager for new localization module  
10:02 <tmortagne> I was wondering what I should put as entityReference when checking PR  
10:02 <tmortagne> can I put null ?  
10:02 <tmortagne> or should I put the main wiki reference ?  
10:05 <tmortagne> note: I'm using it to check rigth related to the scope and document author like with wiki macros  
10:05 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <tmortagne> looks like there is some code expecting that the reference can be null, I will go for null for nw  
10:19 <tmortagne> now  
10:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
10:22 <sburjan\_> what happend to the bot ? the older version was much more efficient, without pollutin the channel  
10:26 <vmassol> has quit

12:40 <AndreasJonsson> tmortange:  Sorry, I didn't see your question this morning.  I think you can pass any reference, since programming rights on the main wiki will imply programming rights on all entities.  But for caching purposes, it is best to pass the wiki reference to the main wiki.  
12:43 <fmancinelli> is there anybody who uses IntelliJ idea? :)  
12:45 <AndreasJonsson> I have pushed a fix for the content dirty flag.  Please look out for regressions.  
12:47 <AndreasJonsson> tmortagne:  I'm sorry, I misspelled your handle.

14:49 <tmortagne> s/be/I/

14:59 <evalica> :)  
15:05 <coud9> has quit  
15:05 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <cdop> "What..."  
15:05 <cdop> "... is your name?"  
15:06 <coud9> has joined #xwiki  
15:10 <vmassol> has quit  
15:36 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
15:41 <vmassol> has quit  
15:48 <cdop> xwiki xe4.2: In {{box and {{code, i get no box, but rather each line with grey background - only in length of the text, bug or feature?  
{{/irclog}}  
15:52 <coud9> has quit  
15:54 <tmortagne> cdop: it's because you are using it in a paragraph  
15:54 <tmortagne> make sure to "isolate" it  
15:55 <cdop> tmortagne: got it thanks - thanks!!!  
15:55 <tmortagne> cdop: you're welcome :)  
16:07 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
16:08 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
16:11 <fmancinelli> ops my messages didn't go through...  
16:12 <tmortagne> fmancinelli: I was starting to wonder :)  
16:12 <fmancinelli> ops sorry, got to get back to home and continue working from there...  
16:12 <fmancinelli> no, no worries :)  
16:12 <fmancinelli> what about history?  
16:12 <fmancinelli> I see a setPreserveVersion(boolean) and setVersion(string) and setWithVersion(boolean) which are possible candidates to handle the history=add/reset/replace option  
16:12 <fmancinelli> but the semantics is quite unclear  
16:12 <vmassol> has quit  
16:13 <tmortagne> fmancinelli: the packager plugin API is crap I was trying to expose something clean on REST side, not to mimic it  
16:13 <tmortagne> I don't remember what is the exact API to keep the history would have to check the code  
16:14 <tmortagne> fmancinelli: there is a branch with the implementation of my proposal  
16:14 <tmortagne> (I don't remember if it's complete)  
16:15 <tmortagne> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/feature-restimportxar  
16:16 <fmancinelli> ah cool, maybe I merge that :)  
16:17 <tmortagne> well I did not merged it because you wanted to do it completely differently  
16:17 <tmortagne> bu there is probably things you can reuse  
16:18 <fmancinelli> hmm... https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/feature-restimportxar/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-rest/xwiki-platform-rest-server/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rest/resources/importfile/ImportResource.java  
16:19 <tmortagne> indeed looks weird  
16:19 <tmortagne> not sure how it ended up like this  
16:19 <tmortagne> let me see what I have locally  
16:19 <Enygma`> has quit  
16:19 <Enygma`1> has joined #xwiki  
16:19 <evalica> has quit  
16:20 <evalica1> has joined #xwiki  
16:20 <fmancinelli> a spurious paste that went unnoticed?  
16:20 <tmortagne> I don't see how I could have copied something like this  
16:21 <fmancinelli> tmortagne, do you still have the branch on your local git?  
16:22 <fmancinelli> maybe you can re-commit  
16:23 <cdop> should i put the empty-line-above-code-macro-hint inside the Usage on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Code+Macro ?  
16:24 <tmortagne> fmancinelli: I have but it's the same :(  
16:24 <tmortagne> I don't have anything uncommitted  
16:24 <tmortagne> checking history  
16:27 <tmortagne> fmancinelli: I think I found it https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/8075f68f43ed5f04f03601a49d19d8910be9c47c/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-rest/xwiki-platform-rest-server/src/main/java/org/xwiki/rest/resources/importfile/ImportResource.java  
16:27 <tmortagne> branch merging mess  
16:29 <tmortagne> you can probably copy that in your branch and delete mine  
16:29 <fmancinelli> ok  
16:31 <fmancinelli> and it also contains the answer to my previous questions :)  
16:32 <tmortagne> yep  
16:33 <tmortagne> there might be something cleaner to do with an enum for the various values of history  
16:33 <tmortagne> I guess restlet can convert to enum
